description:
A stubborn billy goat won't let Dot climb up the mountain unless Dot can win a head butting contest.  
Help Dot push the goat out of the way!

puzzles.description: Make Dot automatically turn on white lights.
puzzles.introduction: When the clouds surround the tall mountain, all you can see is white.  That billy goat could be hiding anywhere.

hints.description: Link the states with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on white lights, make Dot wait for a random time up to 3.0 s then play a goat sound. Then make Dot automatically turn the lights off.

hints.description: Link the White light to the Goat sound using a Random Wait cue set to 3.0 s. Link the Goat sound to the Lights Off state using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning the lights off, make Dot randomly choose to turn on red lights or green lights.
puzzles.introduction: When the billy goat appears, a red light means the goat will push first. A green light means Dot should push first.

hints.description: Link the states with Random Link cues.

puzzles.description: After the red light and the green light, make Dot wait for 2.0 s then act dizzy.
puzzles.introduction: Butting heads with a billy goat is tricky business!  Dot needs to have good timing or Dot could get knocked dizzy!

hints.description: Link the states using two Wait For cues set to 2.0 s.

puzzles.description: After Dot acts dizzy, make Dot automatically say "Why, you!" Then make Dot automatically turn on white lights.
After turning on red lights, if Dot feels a slide left or a slide right, make Dot say "Whoa, catch me!" Then make Dot automatically turn on white lights.
puzzles.introduction: If the billy goat pushes, Dot should try to slide out of the way!

hints.description: Link the Red light to the "Whoa, catch me!" sound using Slide Left and Slide Right cues. Link the "Whoa, catch me!" sound to the White light using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on green lights, if Dot feels a Slide Forward, make Dot play the Humph #1 sound. Then make Dot automatically say "You shush!" and automatically turn on white lights.
puzzles.introduction: If the billy goat doesn't push, then it's Dot's turn to push!

hints.description: Link the Green light to the Humph #1 sound using a Slide Forward cue. Use Auto cues to link from the Humph #1 sound to the "You shush" sound then to the White light.

puzzles.description: PLAY WITH DOT: Help Dot butt heads with the billy goat. Dodge when the goat pushes and try to push the goat three times.
puzzles.introduction: Let's see if Dot has what it takes to be King of the Mountain!
